snippet.title: The Time Plague - Extended Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to The Time Plague, a PC based Steam VR Adventure game set in the world of HG Wells and Jules Verne and in the style of Half-life: Alex. 
 
The game is initially set in the last years of the 19th Century, and over three since the player last heard from their friend, the Time Traveller (from the HG Wells novel The Time Machine). When a mysterious parcel arrives at the player’s small house in Whitechapel, London, the subsequent tale that unfurls takes them across time and space, to solve puzzles and battle enemies to restore the timeline and reunite with their friend.

This trailer introduces some of the unique technical innovations created specifically for the game.
